Class Annone

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.jannled.ocr.ANN
      • com.github.jannled.ocr.Annone

  • public class Annone
extends ANN
    The first version of an artificial neuronal network containing one deep layer.
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    Jannled

        public Annone(int inputNodes,
              int middleNodes,
              int outputNodes)
        Create the ANN with the specified amounts of nodes and 0.5 as start weights.
        Parameters:
        inputNodes - The amount of input neurons.
        middleNodes - The amount of deep neurons.
        outputNodes - The amount of output neurons.
